import "./Navbar.scss" import React from 'react' import { ArrowDropDown, Notifications, Search } from "@material-ui/icons" const [isScrolled, setisScrolled] = useState(initialState) window.onscroll = () => { setScrolled(window.pageYOffset === 0 ? false : true); return () => {window.onscroll = null}; }; const Navbar = () => { return (
Homepage Series Movies New and Popular My List
KID
Settings Logout
) } export default Navbar
